articles.title: Ferroelectric Nanomaterials Could 'Switch On' Devices - AZoNano
articles.description: A property of ferroelectric 2D materials has been disclosed by the materials scientist Boris Yakobson of Rice University and his collaborators. This property could be used as a feature in future devices.

articles.author: HT Tech
articles.title: Solar flare EXPLOSION sparks blackouts in Australia; Solar storm to strike Earth soon - HT Tech
articles.description: The notorious sunspot AR3234 has exploded once again, releasing multiple solar flares that caused blackouts in Australia. The CME released from the event is expected to cause a solar storm on Earth.
articles.content: The unrelenting Sun has exploded multiple times over the last weekend, between March 4 and 5, releasing powerful M-class solar flares. The solar flares exploded within the notorious sunspot AR3234 wh… [+2086 chars]
